bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tai dong bu an 胎動不安 , fetal movement and restlessness. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 74 ：治妊娠傷寒，煩熱頭痛，胎氣不安，或時吐逆，不下食， 白术散方 , “For curing harm caused by cold during pregnancy, vexation with heat and headache, fetal restlessness , sometimes accompanied by vomiting with counterflow and an inability to ingest food, [use] the recipe for the powder with bai zhu ”.
